name: System Monitor Float Free
description: System Monitor Float Free is a monitoring tool. It shows in a floating window information about the system being a useful tool for users interested in seeing how your device is behaving.  With System Monitor Float Free you can:  Monitor the CPU; Monitor RAM; Monitor your Network; Monitor your Battery;  In addition to monitoring system information on floating windows, it also offers the customization of floating windows.  In this version you can customize:  Design is compact or no; CPU Update time; Text Size;
